definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The staurolite schist and cordierite schist have been discovered in northern Xiangshan area for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在相山北部首次發現十字石片岩及堇青石片岩。

sentences.english: The staurolite schist and cordierite schist have been discovered in northern Xiangshan area for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 在相山北部首次發現十字石片岩及堇青石片岩。

sentences.english: Now that you have all your brush settings adjusted, go ahead and brush on some flakes.
sentences.chinese: 現在，您都設置毛刷的調整，繼續和刷子的一些石片。

sentences.english: It is characterized by the presence of flakes and scales as well as redness and itchiness of the skin.
sentences.chinese: 其特點是存在的石片和規模以及紅斑和瘙癢的皮膚。

sentences.english: The stone dapped along the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 石片在池塘表面上掠跳。

definition: Jianshi or Chienshih township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
flat piece of wood/wood chip/CL:塊|块[kuai4],片[pian4]
